shortdesc.ph: Sets the format of the raw playback audio data.
Sets the format of raw audio playback data.

p.codeblock: virtual int setPlaybackAudioFrameParameters(int sampleRate, int channel, RAW_AUDIO_FRAME_OP_MODE_TYPE mode, int samplesPerCall) = 0;
public abstract int setPlaybackAudioFrameParameters(int sampleRate, int channel, int mode, int samplesPerCall);

section.p: The SDK calculates the sampling interval based on the samplesPerCall, sampleRate, and channel parameters. Sampling interval (in seconds) = samplesPerCall / (sampleRate × channel). Make sure the sampling interval is ≥ 0.01 seconds. The SDK triggers the callback based on the sampling interval.

The SDK calculates the sampling interval based on the samplesPerCall, sampleRate, and channel parameters. Sampling interval (in seconds) = samplesPerCall / (sampleRate × channel). Ensure that the sampling interval is ≥ 0.01 seconds. The SDK triggers the callback based on the sampling interval.

section.title: Timing
section.p: Call this method before joining a channel.
Call this method before joining a channel.

section.title: Related Callbacks
section.p: After this method is successfully called, the SDK triggers the callback to report playback audio frames.
This method triggers the callback based on the sampling interval.

plentry.pd: Sampling rate returned in the callback. Can be set to 8000, 16000, 24000, 32000, 44100, or 48000 Hz.

Number of audio channels. Can be set to:
1: Mono.
2: Stereo.
Usage mode of the audio frame. See for details.
Number of audio samples per callback, for example, 1024 for media streaming.
Sampling rate returned in the callback. Can be set to 8000, 16000, 24000, 32000, 44100, or 48000 Hz.

Number of audio channels. Can be set to:
1: Mono.
2: Stereo.

Usage mode of the audio frame:
RAW_AUDIO_FRAME_OP_MODE_READ_ONLY (0): (Default) Read-only mode. For example, the user obtains data through the Agora SDK and pushes RTMP or RTMPS streams.
RAW_AUDIO_FRAME_OP_MODE_READ_WRITE (2): Read-write mode. The user reads data from , modifies it, and then plays it. For example, the user has their own audio effect processing module and performs voice preprocessing, such as voice changing.
Number of data samples returned per call, e.g., 1024 for media streaming.
